Html:
Hi,

First of all thanks for a great control!!!

I would like to draw route in the city between two streets for exmple distance is about 500 meters. But it doesnt't render the route(. It works in another cities but doesn't work in my. Is it restriction of the Google Maps ?

Thanks.
Thanks. It seems it doesn't support my city. Do you know alternative maps with no restrictions to city routes?
you can try microsoft/yahoo maps too, i'l implement them some day too
Thanks for information.  I found map that draw routes in my city. How can I incorporate it in control ?
)  But how I will render route for example on google map using coordinates from different map?
coordinates are global, map type isn't important
